member.summary: Select pacts from the main branch of the consumer

member.summary: Select pacts from the given branch

member.name: P:PactNet.Verifier.ConsumerVersionSelector.FallbackBranch
member.summary: If the consumer doesn't have a branch which matches the property, use this branch instead

member.name: P:PactNet.Verifier.ConsumerVersionSelector.Tag
member.summary: Select pacts with the given tag
member.remarks: It is recommended that the property is used instead

member.name: P:PactNet.Verifier.ConsumerVersionSelector.FallbackTag
member.summary: If the consumer doesn't have a tag which matches the property, use this tag instead
member.remarks: It is recommended that the property is used instead

member.name: P:PactNet.Verifier.ConsumerVersionSelector.Deployed
member.summary: Only return consumer pacts which are deployed to an environment

member.name: P:PactNet.Verifier.ConsumerVersionSelector.Released
member.summary: Only return consumer pacts which are released and currently supported in any environment

member.name: P:PactNet.Verifier.ConsumerVersionSelector.DeployedOrReleased
member.summary: Either or (whereas setting both of the other properties would mean deployed AND released)

member.name: P:PactNet.Verifier.ConsumerVersionSelector.Environment
member.summary: Only return consumer pacts which match this environment, in conjunction with or

member.name: P:PactNet.Verifier.ConsumerVersionSelector.Latest
member.summary: Only return the latest pact for a given branch or tag
member.remarks: This should not be set when used with a branch

member.name: P:PactNet.Verifier.ConsumerVersionSelector.Consumer
member.summary: Only return pacts for the given consumer instead of all consumers
